page.title: 17Do I Believe?
page.content: Some people believe in God from the day they are born. Sometimes I believe in God because I think to myself if there was no God how would we be born? {Zoe Kacprowicz - 11 I don't believe in the Christian Faith and God. My opinion is that if God is real to protect us, why do so many disasters happen? Why take so many innocent lives? {Rachel McGee - 11 I think church should be a place where you can go to pray. I think it should be a peaceful place. { Elizabeth Brierley - 11 My mum and dad and two brothers do not believe in God, but I do. {Nicola Burt - 11
